name: Mercenary Adrift Arcade
description:
Follow Tronix as he drifts across space.  NinjaTronix is an Ex-Soldier from the Starlight Space Force doing odd jobs and responding to distress calls and going under cover within the Tyrant Organization to foil there plans for Galactic Domination.

For more details go to http://www.tronixproductions.com/mercenaryadrift/
